description:
Do you set the same goals over and over again? Do you have trouble following your goals through? Do you set goals, but never end up accomplishing them? If so, this goal setting course is for you!

In 5 short sections this course will give you an overview on goals, and steps to get you on the path of accomplishing them.

This course has 5 Sections:

  1. Defining Goals
  2. Identifying Goals
  3. Finding your "why"
  4. Planning
  5. Execution
title: Design your Life: Goal Planning Crash Course!
